title: PDF to Image Converter
subtitle: Convert your PDF files to high-quality images instantly. All processing happens in your browser - your files never leave your device. Fast, secure, and completely free.
footerText: Your files are processed locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server.
downloadPathHelp: This will be used as a prefix for downloaded file names
downloadPathNote: Note: Due to browser security restrictions, we cannot directly set the download location. The path you specify will be used as a prefix for the filename. You can change your browser's default download location in your browser settings.
zipDownloadNote: ZIP Download: Use the "Download ZIP" button to download all images as a single compressed file. This is more convenient for multiple images and saves bandwidth.

errors.invalidPdf: Please select a valid PDF file.
errors.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 50MB.
errors.conversionFailed: Failed to convert PDF. Please ensure the file is a valid PDF.
errors.zipCreationFailed: Failed to create ZIP file. Please try downloading images individually.
errors.ocrFailed: Text extraction failed, please try again
